snippet: For the fashion designer Jason Wu, his office holds both inspiration and sentiment. And then there’s that cat.
abstract: Excerpts from interview with fashion designer Jason Wu, in which he describes how his new office space in New York influences his work and serves as refuge during fashion week.
lead_paragraph: For the fashion designer Jason Wu, his office holds both inspiration and sentiment. And then there’s that cat.

headline.print_headline: ‘Do Not Disturb’ Is Just a Wish
